snippet: A dispute with pilots over the carrier’s planned expansion of a low-cost unit has the potential to disrupt the travel plans of tens of thousands of passengers.
abstract: Air France-KLM warns that it is prepared to cancel about 60 percent of its scheduled flights due to dispute with pilots; company says it expects more than half of Air France pilots to strike, making flight cancellations inevitable; dispute has potential to disrupt travel plans of tens of thousands of passengers.
lead_paragraph: A dispute with pilots over the carrier’s planned expansion of a low-cost unit has the potential to disrupt the travel plans of tens of thousands of passengers.

headline.main: Air France-KLM Warns of Flight Cancellations as a Strike Looms
headline.print_headline: Air France-KLM Warns of Flight Cancellations as a Strike Looms
